physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Reduced sensation to pain, touch, and vibration; altered deep tendon reflexes; reduced sweating; pupillary abnormalities (absent light reflex); chronic diarrhea; erectile dysfunction.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Heart Rate Variability at rest: 34 ms; Heart Rate Variability during deep breathing: 236 bpm; Blood Pressure response to standing: 26.2% drop; 30/15 ratio: 0.98.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe generalized axonal sensory neuropathy; absent or reduced amplitude of compound muscular action potentials; needle EMG showed mild chronic neurogenic changes.
